description: figure seated with PL leg drawn under body and PR knee bent up with foot down; figure rests PL "hand" on PR knee and PR forearm on same knee, "hand" on cheek; very thin long arms; thick legs; figure wears loincloth type of garment with crosshatching in dark brown; triangular shaped face with large pointed nose and small open mouth; brown short hair; delineated spine and arcing lines on sides of body--ribs?; hole at top back of head
title: Seated Figure
